skills.name: A/B Testing Basics
skills.pattern: Control vs variant, measure impact, statistical significance

skills.name: Hypothesis
skills.pattern: If we change X, then metric Y will improve by Z%

skills.name: Sample Size
skills.pattern: Calculate required sample for desired power and significance

skills.name: Random Assignment
skills.pattern: Randomly assign users to control/variant, consistent assignment

skills.name: Statistical Significance
skills.pattern: p < 0.05 typically, reject null hypothesis

skills.name: Confidence Intervals
skills.pattern: 95% CI: true effect likely within range

skills.name: Power Analysis
skills.pattern: 80% power typical, detect minimum effect size

skills.name: Multiple Testing
skills.pattern: Bonferroni correction, FDR when testing multiple variants

skills.name: Primary Metrics
skills.pattern: One primary metric per test, clear success criteria

skills.name: Guardrail Metrics
skills.pattern: Ensure no negative impact on critical metrics

skills.name: Proxy Metrics
skills.pattern: Short-term metrics that predict long-term success

skills.name: Experiment Design
skills.pattern: Define hypothesis, metrics, sample size, duration

skills.name: Test Duration
skills.pattern: Run until significance or max duration, week effects

skills.name: Stratification
skills.pattern: Ensure equal distribution of user segments

skills.name: Multivariate Testing
skills.pattern: Test combinations of changes, factorial design

skills.name: Feature Flags
skills.pattern: LaunchDarkly, Optimizely, Unleash for assignment

skills.name: Consistent Bucketing
skills.pattern: Hash user ID, consistent assignment across sessions

skills.name: Client vs Server
skills.pattern: Server-side for consistency, client-side for speed

skills.name: Event Tracking
skills.pattern: Track exposures, conversions, ensure data quality

skills.name: Results Analysis
skills.pattern: Statistical significance, practical significance, segments

skills.name: Segment Analysis
skills.pattern: Analyze by user segment, detect heterogeneous effects

skills.name: Novelty Effects
skills.pattern: New feature excitement fades, run longer tests

skills.name: Network Effects
skills.pattern: Treatment affects control via user interactions

skills.name: Peeking
skills.pattern: Don't check results early, increases false positives

skills.name: Sample Ratio Mismatch
skills.pattern: Verify 50/50 split, SRM indicates problems

skills.name: Selection Bias
skills.pattern: Only active users see test, survivorship bias

skills.name: Bayesian A/B Testing
skills.pattern: Probability to be best, continuous monitoring

skills.name: Multi-Armed Bandits
skills.pattern: Shift traffic to winning variant, explore/exploit

skills.name: Sequential Testing
skills.pattern: Valid early stopping with adjusted thresholds

skills.name: Experimentation Culture
skills.pattern: Test everything, data-driven decisions, document learnings
